title: An idea for AFk's
body: What if when one of the players on your team AFK'S the rest of the players get some sort of buff to even out the odds

replies.body: AFKing is unwanted behavior. It should be discouraged with penalties, not encouraged with rewards.

That and let's be realistic, adding something like that could be detrimental to the game.

How long does someone have to be AFK before the buff is given?

How much does the buff actually buff you for?

How is that fair to the other team?

There are questions like this and possibly more than would need to be seriously addressed and figured out before anything like it could, and I say could because there is no guarantee Riot would add it in.
